---

## Codebase Architecture

**Standard:** Feature-Based Architecture (Hybrid)

| Layer        | Path            | Responsibility                                                     |
| :----------- | :-------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Features** | `src/features/` | Domain modules (e.g. `auth`, `dashboard`). Owns components/styles. |
| **Shared**   | `src/shared/`   | Reusable UI atoms and Layouts.                                     |
| **Core**     | `src/hooks/`    | Business logic and global state.                                   |
